panama.log.rollover
Class FileSizeRolloverStrategy

java.lang.Object
  panama.log.rollover.FileSizeRolloverStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
RolloverStrategy
 class FileSizeRolloverStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RolloverStrategy

A RolloverStrategy that requests org.grlea.log.rollover when the log file reaches a specified size. Note that, because the strategy is only consulted at intervals, log files will always grow to slightly more than the specified size before being rolled.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Graham Lea

Constructor Detail

FileSizeRolloverStrategy

FileSizeRolloverStrategy()

Creates a new FileSizeRolloverStrategy.

This constructor is only intended to be used by RolloverManager.

FileSizeRolloverStrategy

public FileSizeRolloverStrategy(long rolloverSize)
Creates a new FileSizeRolloverStrategy that will request log files be rolled when they reach the specified size. The org.grlea.log.rollover file size set by using this method will not be changed by calls to configure(java.util.Map).

Parameters:
rolloverSize - the size (in bytes) at which files shoud be rolled over.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if rolloverSize is less than 1.

               throws java.io.IOException

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while configuring the strategy.

rolloverNow

public boolean rolloverNow(java.util.Date fileCreated,
                           long fileLength)
Description copied from interface: RolloverStrategy
Decides whether or not the log file should be rolled over immediately.

Specified by:
rolloverNow in interface RolloverStrategy
Parameters:
fileCreated - the date and time at which the current log file was created
fileLength - the current length of the log file
Returns:
true if the log file should be rolled over now, false if it should not.

getRolloverSize

public long getRolloverSize()
Returns the size at which files are currenty being rolled over.

setRolloverSize

public void setRolloverSize(long rolloverSize)
Sets the size at which files should be rolled over. One the org.grlea.log.rollover file size has been set using this method, it will not be changed by calls to configure(java.util.Map).

Parameters:
rolloverSize - the new size (in bytes) at which files should be rolled over.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if rolloverSize is less than 1.
